span.span: This page is designed to house all information and links for parents and students to access during the school closure.

br.span: Scroll down for valuable resources and tools for remote learning, helpful resources for families, and the sequence of communication from the district during the closure.

span.br: This guide provides parents and students with guidelines to understanding and navigating Google Classroom.

br.span: Student guidelines to remote instruction with login can be accessed below:

span.br: Enrichment and remediation resources for additional learning activities.
A complete reference of resources in and around our communities.

br.span: Carnegie Elementary and Carnegie Boro Bldg - 10 to 11 am

em.span: Breakfast and lunch is provided to students.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
p.span:
UPMC Children's Hospital is conducting aPittsburgh Study to gain an understanding of what families need during this time and help connect them to resources within their community. To accomplish this, they have compiled a brief 6-minute survey, linked below:
FAMILY STRENGTH SURVEY

em.span: Families who complete the survey will also have the opportunity to win $100.
